variable.name: EXTFLAG
variable.comment: Indicates if a participant is enrolled in the WHI Extension

variable.name: EXTDAYS
variable.description: Days since randomization/enrollment to WHI Extension enrollment
variable.comment: Days since main study randomization or enrollment to WHI extension enrollment. The date of the extension enrollment is the date the participant consented to be part of the WHI extension.

variable.name: EXTSTARTYR
variable.description: Years in WHI at start of WHI extension
variable.comment: The number of years in WHI at the time the WHI extension started. This may or may not not be the year the participant consented to the WHI extension. In general a participant will have consented to the extension prior to the start of the extension, but many also consented after the start of the extension.
